item.description:
Enjoy the amazing view, fascinating history and fun activities at the oldest continually operating Weather Observatory in the country. We will check out the sights, do some hiking and enjoy and picnic lunch on the rocks.

Free admission to events. Donation for materials for some activities. For details and parking information, call (617) 696-0562 or www.bluehill.org

Directions:
Take Rt I-93 (Route 128) to exit 2B (Milton, Rt 138 North). Follow the exit ramp to the first set of traffic lights. Go straight through the lights and the parking lot is 0.5 miles ahead on the right. The museum is at the end of the parking lot.
item.name: Blue Hills Observatory Open House, Kite Festival & Hiking
